content:
Hello @everyone just a quick note to say that the list of GSoC2025 project ideas for BRL-CAD was recently updated to include four additional projects. Give them a look over to see if any sound exciting: https://github.com/opencax/GSoC/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3A%22GSoC+2025%22+label%3A%22Project%3A+BRL-CAD%22

You can submit proposals for more than one topic -- just indicate your preference in your write-up (e.g., "this is my #1 preference").

Hey everyone!

I just got an email from GSOC! My proposal has been accepted!

Thanks a lot @Sean , @Daniel Rossberg , and all the other mentors for choosing me!

I will try my best to make a valuable contribution to this organization. :heart:
Likewise @LorenzoPegorari we're looking forward to working with you as well!

Hey everyone,
I am excited to announce that I have been selected in GSoC 2025!!
A huge thanks to all mentors for selecting me for this incredible opportunity. I will make sure that I make valuable contribution. :heart: :heart:
Congratulations @LorenzoPegorari, @Simarjot Singh, and @Andrea Braghin on being selected for this years GSoC! I look forward supporting you with your projects.

Happy and grateful for this opportunity. I am looking forward for the weeks ahead.
Thank you, I will do my very best üí™üèª
